text: The Central Zone is a region of India where the Central Indo-Aryan languages, or Hindi languages, are spoken. Central Zone may also refer to: ==Places== * Central Zone, Bhutan, an administrative district of Bhutan * Central Zone of São Paulo, an administrative zone of the city of São Paulo, Brazil * Central Zone of the Town of Angra do Heroismo in the Azores, a UNESCO World Heritage Site ==Sports== * Central Zone cricket team, central India * Central Zone cricket team (Bangladesh) * Central Zone cricket team (Pakistan) * Central Zone women's cricket team, central India ==See also== * Central Railway zone, a zone of Indian Railways, headquartered in Mumbai * Central Time Zone
title: Central Zone (disambiguation)
